field.name: summary
field.value: Create scope concept for the container

field.name: description
field.value:
The project I'm working on has the need for scoped services, where the scope is defined by the hub. An initial scope implementation for web applications would create containers for session and request, and use a specific configuration file each of them.
A http module should be added to the Windsor Container project that provides this behavior, at first as as a proof-of-concept.

comment.author: ayenderahien
comment.text: We can implement this as either sub containers or component selectors.
